mapper.select: select username as "userName", user_token as "userToken", last_active as "lastActiveDate", remote_address as "remoteAddress", service_token as "serviceToken" from user_sessions where username = #{userName}
mapper.insert: insert into user_sessions(username, user_token, last_active, remote_address, service_token) values (#{userName},#{userToken}, sysdate, #{remoteAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serviceToken,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
